data: MASA Li et al. (2024e)
Multi-agent framework, with specialized risk and portfolio agents.
Based on the portfolio strategy diversification guidance mechanism.
Superior risk-adjusted portfolio, including CSI300, DJIA, S&P500
FreQuant Jeon et al. (2024)
Frequency domain analysis used to identify patterns.
Multi-granularity asset representation through DFT.
ARR: 2.1Ã— improvement, Holding period transformation enhances stability
EarnMore Zhang et al. (2024d)
Adjustable investment portfolio, composed of maskable tokens.
Self-supervised masking and reconstruction.
Return: +40%, Risk level is about the same
TrendTrader Ding et al. (2024b)
Multi-modal fusion of price and sentiment.
Spatio-temporal RL framework.
Superior performance in ARR, ASR, MDD on indices like DJIA, SSE-50
Network-EDM Hui and Wang (2024)
Reducing extreme risk through network theory.
Using pairwise independent sets for diversification.
Excellent performance during CSI 300 market downturns
Market-Graph Yamagata and Ono (2024)
Tracking indices based on the structure of market graphs.
Trading volume sparsity regularization and primal-dual splitting.
Higher Sharpe ratios on S&P500 and others
LLM-Alpha Kou et al. (2024)
Utilizing LLM-based alpha factors.
Multi-agent system, controlled by dynamic attention gates.
Portfolio: +53.17% compared to market -11.73% (China, 2023)
